sections.heading: Terms, defined.For purposes of sections 25-2301 to 25-2310:(1) Case includes any suit, action, or proceeding; and(2) In forma pauperis means the permission given by the court for a party to proceed without prepayment of fees and costs or security
sections.text: SourceLaws 1972, LB 1120, ยง 1;Laws 1979, LB 148, ยง 1;
